source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCount FROM SalesLT.CustomerAddress;

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Copy All Tables in SQL using For each')]

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(ModifiedDate) AS LastUpatedDate FROM SalesLT.Customer;

activities.name: Copy data from table to file

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from SalesLT.Customer WHERE ModifiedDate > '@{activity('Get HMW').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' AND ModifiedDate <= 
    '@{activity('Get Max Date from Database').output.firstRow.LastUpatedDate}'

activities.name: Update latest date to HMW file

dependsOn.activity: Copy data from table to file

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCount FROM SalesLT.Product;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCount FROM SalesLT.Product;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS RecordCount FROM SalesLT.Customer

activities.name: Copy Customer table to a new table
Copy Customer Name and Address details

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT c.CustomerID, c.FirstName, c.MiddleName, c.LastName, a.AddressID, a.AddressType
FROM [SalesLT].[Customer] c 
JOIN [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] a
ON c.CustomerID = a.CustomerID;
